objectives.instructionText: Locate the full digital display behind the steering wheel. Center it in your camera view.
objectives.voicePrompt: Yup, that big ol' screen in front of you — no, not the radio — the thing that tells you how fast you're breaking the speed limit.

objectives.instructionText: Find the wide touchscreen in the center of your dashboard.
objectives.voicePrompt: Bingo. That's your mission control. If you hit the windshield wipers instead, we're gonna have words.

objectives.instructionText: Spot the row of buttons and knobs for adjusting your A/C and heat below the center screen.
objectives.voicePrompt: Those buttons? Yeah, those are gonna save you when your wife says it's too cold even though it's 78 degrees.

objectives.instructionText: Look at the buttons on both sides of your steering wheel. Make sure you see them clearly.
objectives.voicePrompt: This is where you pretend you're a fighter pilot. Or at least, where you change the radio without crashing.

successCriteria.userActionConfirmation: Tap on each hotspot when centered to confirm.

quiz.question: Which part of the dashboard shows your current speed?
quiz.voiceOnCorrect: That's right! You still got some brain cells firing after all.
quiz.voiceOnIncorrect: Oof. Wrong. But hey, at least you're trying, boomer!

completion.completionVoicePrompt: Solid start! If you were this sharp back in '85 you might've made regional manager. Onward!

objectives.instructionText: Focus your camera on the front passenger seat. You're about to adopt a virtual travel companion!
objectives.voicePrompt: Attention cat lovers: Welcome to Victor's Special Bonus Round. Let's give these cats a seat they deserve.

objectives.instructionText: Tap the passenger seat to place a cozy 3D cat onto the seat or lap area.
objectives.voicePrompt: Tap gently — you don't want to spook your new furry friend... yet.

objectives.instructionText: An 'Eject Button' has appeared. Tap it to begin the final sequence.
objectives.voicePrompt: Locate the Eject Button, Commander. It's about to get... messy.

objectives.instructionText: Tap the Eject Button. Watch the sunroof open, hear mechanical sounds, and prepare for lift-off!
objectives.voicePrompt: And now, for the moment Victor's been waiting for... EJECT!

successCriteria.userActionConfirmation: Follow all taps and visual prompts to complete the bonus.

completion.completionVoicePrompt: Cat launched! Mission success! You're now officially ridiculous — and we love that.
